generated_body: If you click on the article titled "Alexis Crawford: Clark Atlanta student filed a police report on unwanted kissing before she vanished," you may expect to read about the circumstances surrounding the disappearance of Alexis Crawford, a student at Clark Atlanta University. The piece may also explore the investigations that followed her disappearance and the community's response to the situation.
